quotes.quote: I chose a man slender and skinny.
A skinny, starving stray; it looked so pitifully small, a fluff of silver grey.
Little skinny shoulder-blades sticking through your clothes! And where you'll get a jacket from God above knows.
To see the skinny hag in black who boosts you up the curb.
People who are skinny-fat may be thin, but they have no muscle tone and a high percentage of body fat.
Skinny legs like I always wanted sister look at me again. You'd love me if I were as skinny as him.
I don't get fat, I get skinny.
You want to be skinny and have a good body? You have to work out every day and say no to certain foods.
Nothing tastes as good as skinny feels.
Rising like gulls. Then, with a finger skinny.
We'll all stay skinny 'cause we just won't eat.
It's important to be fit, but you shouldn't get too skinny. You need to have curves.
Most of us are either too thin to enjoy eating. or too fat to enjoy walking.
If you want to get fat, don't eat fast; if you want to get thin. don't eat fast.
If you are a skinny, baby-faced teenager, the last thing you want to hear is that you're cute.
Statistically, skinny women die younger than fat women. Why? Because fat women are killing them.
Thin people are beautiful, but fat people are adorable.
If you want to be skinny, do what skinny people do.
Skinny jeans were only good if you had skinny genes.
Being slim is the new elitism. Thinness today says that you are richer, smarter, and more successful than the overweight masses.
Skinny women don't enjoy being told they're skinny nowadays. They enjoy telling you how they got that way, as though starvation were an achievement.
Skinny guys fight till they're burger.
You want to be skinny and have a good body? You have to work out every day and say no to certain foods.
Nothing tastes as good as skinny feels.
Me being a skinny guy, I could crawl into the steel pit.
Skinny is only one body type.
If we're talking about being skinny or losing weight, I don't have that problem; it's genetics.
